name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhanced Canvas LMS To Do (Ungraded List)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This displays the full To Do list of ungraded submissions in Canvas LMS, with filter, search and sorting functionality.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance Teacher To Do list on Canvas LMS ğŸš€

This extension displays a comprehensive list of your ungraded submissions from all of your courses in Canvas LMS, featuring:

â˜°	Filter: Customise your view by excluding specific roles (e.g., TA role) or focusing on particular criteria (e.g., ungraded submissions older than 7 days).
ğŸ”½	Sort: Organise submissions in any order that suits your workflow, whether by submission date or other factors.
ğŸ”	Search: Quickly find submissions based on various parameters, such as assessment names or student names.
ğŸ’¾  Export: Export the list to an Excel spreadsheet.

Take control of your grading process and improve your efficiency with this tool.
